text:
Carole Baskin ("née" Stairs Jones; born June 6, 1961) is an American animal rights activist. She is the owner of Big Cat Rescue.
Baskin became well known when she was featured in the 2020 Netflix documentary series ' about Oklahoma-based private zoo operator Joe Exotic. Following the series' release, Baskin has been targeted by Internet memes related to the disappearance of Don Lewis, her second husband.
